dobyear = #{dobyear,jdbcType=INTEGER},

last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
